text_block_list.text: Symboli Rudolf will be racing in the Twinkle Series this weekend. So…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Huh? Prez's race?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Normally I'd love to go, but… Mmm…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Oh, but… that's right…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Prez'll win, just like she always does, right? So she'll be showered with praise again…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Maybe… seeing that one more time will help me shake off whatever's been bothering me.
choice_data_list: Why don't we go and find out?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Alright, I'll go!
And so the day of Symboli Rudolf's race came.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Symboli Rudolf is leading! She's so quick, so fast!! A three, no four length lead!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Symboli Rudolf wins!! What overwhelming strength! This is how an "Emperor" races!!

text_block_list.name: Crowd
text_block_list.text: Emperor! Emperor! Emperor!!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Prez was as great as ever… She's so strong, so fast, and the coolest Uma Musume.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: But…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: There's something I need to talk to her about. Will you come too?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: I'm coming in!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Oh, if it isn't Teio… and I see you're here as well, Trainer-kun.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: How surprising. I would never have expected the excitable, impulsive Teio to actually knock before entering.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Yeah… Actually, there's something I need to talk to you about.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Hmm… Okay, what is it?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Prez… You're my idol. You're the most amazing and coolest Uma Musume out there. I want to be just like you one day.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: It made me happy hearing everyone praise you.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: And whenever I saw you smile back to your fans it would make me so excited.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: But… All of that is gone now…

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Oh? What do you mean by that, Teio?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Seeing everyone cheer for you after you beat me…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: It… it really made my chest hurt…

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Made your chest hurt…?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Yeah. It hurt so bad that I couldn't stop thinking about it… So I tried to run and run to get rid of it, but it wouldn't go away.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: It's strange, isn't it? But after seeing your race today I think I finally understand what happened.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: I… I want to become the best Uma Musume in the world. That's why I run.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: So I can't let anyone else be called amazing. No, I won't let anyone else be called amazing!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Not even you, Prez! I'll show everyone that I'm the greatest.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: I want to be just like you, Prez. That hasn't changed. You're my number one idol!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: But… that isn't it… I want to become so great that even you'd cheer me on and call me amazing!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: And that's why I came to talk to you! Prez, this is my declaration of war!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Say it clearly, Teio.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Okay. One day I'll surpass your title of "Emperor" and become a Monarch in my own right.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: So you better be prepared, Prez!!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Heh…

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: From the bleachers down to the turf… You've finally reached the same stage as I. I'm very happy for you, Teio.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: That being said, I have no intention of giving up the title of "strongest". I hope you understand just how difficult the road ahead is.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Of course!!
As Tokai Teio nodded gleefully, Symboli Rudolf happily smiled back .

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Woah, I actually managed to say it!! Ehehe, my heart is still racing though.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Thank you for coming with me. Also, umm… thanks for everything you've done!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: And… I'll be relying on you even more from now on!
choice_data_list: From now on? Does that mean…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Geez, you're so dense! If you keep that up, I won't let you be my trainer anymore.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Our target is the strongest Uma Musume in the world after all. So get it together, Trainer!!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Alrighty! I'm so happy, I did my declaration and I got a trainer to boot!!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: This is the start of the legend of the Unbeaten Tokai Teio!
